casebody.data:
Joseph B. HAGE, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 18, 1924.) No. 320. Merrill, Sisson & Hanagan, of Utica, N. Y., for plaintiff in error. Oliver D. Burden, U. S. Atty., of Syracuse, N. Y.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MAYER, Circuit Judges. ‘ ■

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
